trans-unit.source: Represents the binding element for the named pipe transport.
trans-unit.target: Representa o elemento de associação para o transporte de pipe nomeado.

trans-unit.source: This transport uses URIs of the form "`net.pipe`://`hostname`/`path`".
trans-unit.target: Esse transporte usa URIs no formato "`net.pipe`://`hostname`/`path`".

trans-unit.source: Other URI components are optional.
trans-unit.target: Outros componentes do URI são opcionais.

trans-unit.source: The NamedPipeTransportBindingElement class is the starting point for creating a custom binding that implements the named pipes transport protocol.
trans-unit.target: A classe NamedPipeTransportBindingElement é o ponto de partida para a criação de uma associação personalizada que implementa o protocolo de transporte de pipes nomeados.

trans-unit.source: This transport is used for on-machine [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]-to-[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] communication.
trans-unit.target: Esse transporte é usada na máquina [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]- para -[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] comunicação.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] service model uses this class to create factory objects that implement the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelFactory> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener> interfaces.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] modelo de serviço usa essa classe para criar objetos de fábrica que implementam o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelFactory>e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener>interfaces.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelFactory>

trans-unit.source: These factory objects then create and accept the channels that transmit SOAP messages using the named pipes protocol.
trans-unit.target: Esses objetos de fábrica, em seguida, criar e aceitam os canais que transmitem mensagens SOAP usando o protocolo pipes nomeados.

trans-unit.source: You configure the factories that this class creates by setting its properties, such as: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.NamedPipeTransportBindingElement.ConnectionPoolSettings%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Configurar as fábricas de que essa classe cria definindo suas propriedades, como: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.NamedPipeTransportBindingElement.ConnectionPoolSettings%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.NamedPipeTransportBindingElement.ConnectionPoolSettings%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also set properties on the base class, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ConnectionOrientedTransportBindingElement>, such as: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ConnectionOrientedTransportBindingElement.MaxBufferSize%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ConnectionOrientedTransportBindingElement.TransferMode%2A>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ConnectionOrientedTransportBindingElement.ConnectionBufferSize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode definir propriedades na classe base, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ConnectionOrientedTransportBindingElement>, tais como: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ConnectionOrientedTransportBindingElement.MaxBufferSize%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ConnectionOrientedTransportBindingElement.TransferMode%2A>e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ConnectionOrientedTransportBindingElement.ConnectionBufferSize%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ConnectionOrientedTransportBindingElement.ConnectionBufferSize%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ConnectionOrientedTransportBindingElement.TransferMode%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ConnectionOrientedTransportBindingElement.MaxBufferSize%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ConnectionOrientedTransportBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: For a complete list of properties, see <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ConnectionOrientedTransportBindingElement>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista completa das propriedades, consulte <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ConnectionOrientedTransportBindingElement>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ConnectionOrientedTransportBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: Finally, you can set properties on the base class of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ConnectionOrientedTransportBindingElement>, which is <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement>, such as <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement.MaxBufferPoolSize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Por fim, você pode definir propriedades na classe base de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ConnectionOrientedTransportBindingElement>, que é <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement>, como <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement.MaxBufferPoolSize%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement.MaxBufferPoolSize%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ConnectionOrientedTransportBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: For a complete list of properties, see <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista completa das propriedades, consulte <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.NamedPipeTransportBindingElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.NamedPipeTransportBindingElement"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.NamedPipeTransportBindingElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.NamedPipeTransportBindingElement"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: This method is a copy constructor used to clone the binding element, and is exposed so that derived classes can implement <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.NamedPipeTransportBindingElement.Clone%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é um construtor de cópia usado para clonar o elemento de associação e é exposto para que as classes derivadas podem implementar <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.NamedPipeTransportBindingElement.Clone%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.NamedPipeTransportBindingElement.Clone%2A>

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.NamedPipeTransportBindingElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.NamedPipeTransportBindingElement"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Creates a copy of the current binding element.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia do elemento de associação atual.

trans-unit.source: Returns a copy of the current binding element.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma cópia do elemento de associação atual.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of connection pool settings.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de conexão as configurações do pool.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.NamedPipeConnectionPoolSettings"></xref> object that contains various properties related to connection pooling.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.NamedPipeConnectionPoolSettings"> </xref> objeto que contém várias propriedades relacionadas ao pooling de conexão.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the pipe settings for the named pipe transport binding element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as configurações de conexão para o elemento de associação de transporte de pipe nomeado.

trans-unit.source: The pipe settings for the named pipe transport binding element.
trans-unit.target: As configurações de conexão para o elemento de associação de transporte de pipe nomeado.

trans-unit.source: Returns the URI scheme for the transport.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o esquema de URI para o transporte.

trans-unit.source: This property is provided to enable binding validation against base addresses.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é fornecida para habilitar a validação de associação em endereços de base.

trans-unit.source: Returns the URI scheme for the transport, which is "net.pipe".
trans-unit.target: Retorna o esquema de URI para o transporte, o que é "pipe".
